LLM Suggested Input: LLM can generate realistic temp based on scenario and month
Current Calculation Method: seasonal_temperature(): T_avg + T_amp * sin(2π/12*(month - phi)) + random noise

LLM Suggested Input: LLM can generate humidity based on temp and scenario
Current Calculation Method: seasonal_humidity(): RH_avg + RH_amp * sin(2π/12*(month - phi)+π) - 0.15*(T-T_avg) + random noise, clamped 5-95%
Incremental counter i from 0 to n_samples-1
start_date + i*30 days formatted as YYYY-MM-DD

LLM Suggested Input: LLM can estimate thermal cycles based on scenario and month
Current Calculation Method: seasonal_cycles(): cycles_base + cycles_amp * abs(sin(2π/12*(month - 6))) + random noise, rounded and >=0

Notes: Computed via compute_sensitivity_factor() using aging_month and temperature
Current Calculation Method: 1 - k_sensitivity_base * (aging_month/12)**(1/3) * Arrhenius(Ea_sensitivity, T) * random unit variation

Notes: Sum of settling + ionic + thermal + humidity drifts
Current Calculation Method: offset = settling_drift + ionic_drift + thermal_drift + humidity_drift, each computed with random variation

Notes: Probability used to generate burst noise

LLM Suggested Input: Depends on all previous inputs and calculations
